Summary: looks like a star but when you zoom in its dances and moves from side to side then it forms into a cross like figure
divs: Sighting Detailsit started when the sun went down and the stars come out. a black cloud formed over it and a light shot out 3 more lights also it formed into a triangle and smashed togehter aand dissappeared. then later that night more started to come out of it my mother and I were sitting in the living room for about 2 hours watchng them lights dance back in forth up and down. after a couple minutes of watching it we called up some people to see if they were seeing the same stuff as we were they were seeing the same thing to. my reation to it was wow W.T.H is that it kind of scared me at first because I didn't know what it was and what its doing. later that night around 11:00p.m I was getting tired of watching them so I went to bed. but when I got up at ^:30 for school they were still out in the sky
